#ChemicalsInOurLife #ForeverChemicals https://t.co/nTQlZGMFKb

Since 7 July 2020 #phthalates DEHP, DBP, DIBP and BBP are restricted in articles in the EU. This restriction will save approx. 2️⃣0️⃣0️⃣0️⃣ boys each year from impaired fertility in later life.
